entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Igloolik
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:17 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, -36.5°C

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 31.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light early this morning. High minus 31. Wind chill minus 55 this morning and minus 42 this afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 34. Wind chill near minus 44. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
